doc.after: Alonso de Ojeda (who had sailed with Columbus) reached the Guajira Peninsula in 1499.[27] Spanish explorers, led by Rodrigo de Bastidas, made the first exploration of the Caribbean littoral in 1500.[28] Christopher Columbus navigated near the Caribbean in 1502.[29] In 1508, Vasco NÃºÃ±ez de Balboa accompanied an expedition to the territory through the region of Gulf of UrabÃ¡ and they founded the town of Santa MarÃ­a la Antigua del DariÃ©n in 1510, the first stable settlement on the continent.
